name: You will remember
description:
Visit
Québec city has if you’ve lived there your entire life! Go from a center point
of the  town. Then, take a stroll on the
Plaines d’abraham where the countries fate was decided. Walk side by side the
citadelle that stands high and strong for more than 400 years and more. Pass
right into the most photgraphed hotel in the world : the château frontenac
where history in war and cinetmatic was made! And many more!
